nodes.text: The SX-21 pump-action scatter blaster, also known as the SX-21 scatterblaster, or the SX-21 blaster rifle, was a model of pump-action scatter blaster rifle made by Merr-Sonn Munitions, Inc., and proved invaluable to Imperial mudtroopers during the heavy fighting with the Mimbanese during the Mimban campaign.
Chewbacca used an SX-21 after he escaped Imperial captivity, using the rifle as a temporary substitute for the bowcaster favored by Wookiees.
